page.title: 03Education in East Huntspill
page.content: There are 76 pupils in East Huntspill County Primary school, 28 girls and 48 boys.They are taught maths,language, environmental studies,music,science, P.E.,R.E.,art and craft.There are three teachers in the school and one part-time who comes on Wednesday afternoon and all day Thursday.There is 1 helper,2 dinner ladies,2 cleaners 1 caretaker and 11 Governers.The children spend 6 1/4 hours in school altogether.That includes break-time. The school day starts at 9am.Play-time is from 10.40 to 10.55.Dinner break is from 12.10 to 1.15.Last break is from 2.20 to 2.35 and we leave school at 3.15pm education finished for the day!
